name: pyljvim
description:
pyljvim is a a Livejournal Plugin for Vim. One can post to the Livejournal  directly from vim! :)

How to use pyljvim:
1) Provide Configfile.txt required details and Install it on your platform
2) Two Templates for posting are provided

:LJTemplate standart

OR

:LJTemplate extended

Fill in the details. Subject is a must.
3) Give a Space after those details and type your text to the world at LJ.
4) When you have finished typing it, do a:

:LJPost

5) Your post is online.

-- 
Senthil
http://phoe6.livejournal.com
install_details:
Installation Instructions.
1) Edit Configfile.txt with all the required details.
* Provide the Location of your VIM and PYTHON. ( Keep the Example as the Reference and Provide appropriate Directories)
* If you need PROXY SUPPORT ( Yeah, I need it! :) Give value USE_PROXY as True and provide the details. Otherwise, change the value of USE_PROXY to False
* Provide your LJ Username and Password. ( If Password is not provided, it will be prompt at the time of posting)

2) python install_pyljvim.py 

3) Thats all. Now can start using it.

For a try, do from your vim:
:LJTemplate startart

Fill Subject and type some giberrish and do

:LJPost

versions.release_notes: Updates to python installation script. Uses distutils.
